Articles.Content: Is there a shortcut to raise or lower the landing legs on a rocket, or do I always have to assign it to a key?
Erhm.. Isn't that only for landing gear? Also for the legs?
Both landing legs and landinggear are automatically assigned to the gear actiongroup activated (by default) by the "G" key.

The action group is indeed called 'gear', but legs are also auto-assigned to it. Of course, since it's basically an action group with a fancy button and a separate keybinding, you can put anything there if you want.
God.. I've had this game since 0.17 and some how I've not figured that out.. Just thought I always had to assign a key to the landing legs..
